title: Alameda County Public Health Department
cleaned_text: National Public Health Week Please join us in celebrating Naitonal Public Health Week April 3-7. Positive for COVID-19? People who test positive and are experiencing mild or moderate symptoms may be eligible for treatment. MPX While the risk is low, MPX (formerly called Monkeypox) is circulating in our communities and you may be at higher risk of exposure. Women, Infants & Children This program provides healthy food benefits, education, breastfeeding support, and referrals to health care and other community services. COVID-19 Vaccines COVID-19 vaccine is available in Alameda County! COVID-19 Testing New COVID-19 testing sites are opening. Offices of HIV Care & Prevention The mission is to reduce the rates of new HIV infections; increase the number of county residents who know their HIV status earlier through HIV testing; and linking individuals who are positive into care.
